alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 11:15AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Garfield, Sevier, Kane, Iron and Piute Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1046 cfs), minor flooding will affect fields near and downstream of the river gage. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain below flood stage, but above action stage this afternoon through Sunday night. The river will then rise back near flood stage Monday afternoon, and oscillate around flood stage through Wednesday, with a maximum value of 4.1 feet forecast Wednesday morning. The river is forecast to remain near or above flood stage through the middle of the month and potentially beyond. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet (1046 cfs). &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday at 1200 PM MDT.
